sources.title: A Mission to Kill
sources.description: Title: A Mission to Kill Summary: His activities in Viet Nam would be denied by the U S Government. Only two others providing similar service returned to the states. Now he's getting mental help in a military institution, escapes, and must be recaptured. Directed by: Sean MacGregor Actors: William Smith, Steve Oliver, Marcy Bond Production Company: American Victor Organization Release Date: 15 August 2003 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 His activities in Viet Nam would be denied by the U S Government. Only two others providing similar service returned to the states. Now he's getting mental help in a military institution, escapes, and must be recaptured.

metadata.Plot: His activities in Viet Nam would be denied by the U S Government. Only two others providing similar service returned to the states. Now he's getting mental help in a military institution, escapes, and must be recaptured.
